title: having issues installing the client
body: So i chose to install the update but when it gets to 30%, says unknown error and crashes but now I have gone through the kernel and everything cannot revert back to the old version until the new client is installed can anyone help me have a bricked game now....

replies.body:
You should be able to launch your Legacy client without installing the updated client. If you cannot find your Legacy client, try doing this:

On Windows:

1. Click Start.
2. Type "Run", or press WinKey and R.
2. Paste this: _C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.exe_
3. Click "OK".
